== Pathiyoor (CT) (628261) ==

Pathiyoor (CT) is a town in the [[Karthikappally]] taluka of [[Alappuzha]] district with an area of 11.08 sq. km. and harbouring 6089 households with total population of 23460 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Alappuzha]] is at a distance of 41 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 105 km. Male population is 10939 and female population is 12521. Scheduled Caste population is 2581 and Scheduled Tribes population is 110. Census Location Code of the town is 628261<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 41 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 105 km. Railway station is at Kayamkulam at a distance of 3 km.
